snippet: Broad federal legislation is needed to close potentially lethal interstate loopholes.
abstract: Editorial calls for broad federal legislation to close potentially lethal interstate loopholes as some states tighten gun control and others weaken it; warns robust gun legislation in states like Maryland will be compromised by more lenient rules elsewhere until federal controls are in place.
lead_paragraph: Broad federal legislation is needed to close potentially lethal interstate loopholes.
